classification.task_goal: Develop a CNN and LSTM model using Google traces usage dataset with large descriptive data analysis.
primary_constraints: Perform large descriptive data analysis on the dataset.
Clean the dataset before model development.
Develop both CNN and LSTM models.
Compare the performance of CNN and LSTM models.
classification.reasoning: The user explicitly shifted the task from the previous focus on facial recognition to a new goal involving the Google dataset and model development, which indicates a valid adaptation of the task.
